scripts.css: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 sass/index.scss static/css/campus.min.css
scripts.watch: node-sass --include-path node_modules/ --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 -w sass/index.scss static/css/campus.min.css
